mapper.update:
update p2p_linkface_msg
CUST_ID = #{custId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
REAL_NAME = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID_CARD = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NATION = #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID_CARD_ADDR = #{idCardAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUTHORITY = #{authority,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TIME_LIMIT = #{timeLimit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YEAR = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MONTH = #{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DAY = #{day,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANK_NO = #{bankNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEMO = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXT1 = #{ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXT2 = #{ext2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update p2p_linkface_msg set CUST_ID = #{custId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, REAL_NAME = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID_CARD = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NATION = #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID_CARD_ADDR = #{idCardAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUTHORITY = #{authority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TIME_LIMIT = #{timeLimit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YEAR = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MONTH = #{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DAY = #{day,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANK_NO = #{bankNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEMO = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXT1 = #{ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXT2 = #{ext2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
